article.headline: Manhattan 75, Marist 74
article.story: NEW YORK (AP) -- Darryl Crawford scored on a floating jumper in the lane with 7 seconds left to lift Manhattan past Marist 75-74 on Tuesday night. The basket provided the Jaspers (11-10, 8-3 Metro Atlantic) with their only lead in the second half. The Red Foxes (15-7, 7-4) had a chance to win it, but Jared Jordan's layup with 0.8 left was blocked by Devon Austin. Crawford and Arturo Dubois led Manhattan with 13 points, Patrick Bouli added 11 points and Guy Ngarndi and Antoine Pearson had 10 each. Will Whittington scored 21 points, including six 3-pointers. Ryan Stilphen and Jared Jordan added 17 each for Marist, losers in three of its last four games. The teams, tied for second place in the MAAC prior to the game, traded 3-point goals throughout, with the Red Foxes making 11-of-24 treys and the Jaspers hitting 8-of-19. Whittington had 15 points and Jordan 13 to help the Red Foxes to a 45-37 lead at halftime. Ngarndi scored six points and Dubois four in a 10-0 run that narrowed the lead to 48-47 with 16:26 to go. Marist achieved its biggest lead of the half at 64-57 when Ben Farmer connected on a 3-point goal with 7:19 left. Whittington drilled a 3-pointer to provide the Red Foxes with a 74-70 lead with 1:06 remaining, but Pearson responded with a 3-point goal to narrow the margin to one with 54 seconds left. Manhattan got the ball back for the go-ahead possession after Jordan missed a jump shot with 24 seconds on the clock.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
